title: Current Number of Full-Time Permanent Employees; Diffusion Index for Federal Reserve District 3: Philadelphia
notes: Current Number of Full-Time Permanent Employees reports the change in number of full-time permanent employees compared to the previous month for reporting service firms. The diffusion index is calculated by taking the percent reporting increases and subtracting the percentage reporting decreases. For more information about this release from the Federal Reserve Bank of Philadelphia, visit here. (https://www.philadelphiafed.org/research-and-data/regional-economy/nonmanufacturing-business-outlook-survey/)
